title: Fragment, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk, metal, velvet
Technique: cut supplementary warp loops in a plain weave foundation (note that the foundation weft is metallic and the use of float patterning in the background)
description: Red allover cut velvet pattern of small blossoms arranged in offset rows - the slant of the flower alternating from row to row. Background is gold.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 19th century. Medium: cotton, silk, metal, velvet
Technique: cut supplementary warp loops in a plain weave foundation (note that the foundation weft is metallic and the use of float patterning in the background). 1972-81-48-a,b.
